trans-unit.source: Allows you to override property, field, and class attributes when you use the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> to serialize or deserialize an object.
trans-unit.target: Permite a substituição de propriedade, campo e atributos de classe quando você usa o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> para serializar ou desserializar um objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> enables the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override the default way of serializing a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> permite que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para substituir a forma padrão de serializar um conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL--even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways.
trans-unit.target: Substituir a serialização dessa maneira tem dois usos: primeiro, você pode controlar e aumentar a serialização de objetos encontrados em uma DLL – mesmo se você não tiver acesso à fonte de; em seguida, você pode criar um conjunto de classes serializáveis, mas serializar os objetos de várias maneiras.

trans-unit.source: For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, em vez de serialização de membros de uma instância da classe como elementos XML, você pode serializá-los como atributos XML, resultando em um documento mais eficiente de transporte.

trans-unit.source: After you create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, you pass it as an argument to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Depois de criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> do objeto, você passá-lo como um argumento para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the data contained by the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> to override attributes that control how objects are serialized.
trans-unit.target: Resultante <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> usa os dados contidos pelo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> para substituir os atributos que controlam como os objetos são serializados.

trans-unit.source: To accomplish this, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object associated with each overridden object type.
trans-unit.target: Para fazer isso, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> contém uma coleção de tipos de objeto são substituídos, bem como um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto associado a cada tipo de objeto substituído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object itself contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> próprio objeto contém um conjunto apropriado de objetos de atributos que controlam como cada campo, propriedade ou classe é serializado.

trans-unit.source: The process for creating and using an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object is as follows:
trans-unit.target: O processo para criar e usar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto é o seguinte:

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Crie um objeto de atributo que é apropriado para o objeto que está sendo substituído.

trans-unit.source: For example, to override a field or property, create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, using the new, derived type.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, para substituir um campo ou propriedade, crie um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, usando o novo tipo derivado.

trans-unit.source: You can optionally assign a new <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Namespace%2A> that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, você pode atribuir um novo <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.ElementName%2A>, ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute.Namespace%2A> que substitui o namespace ou nome de atributo da classe base.

trans-unit.source: Add the attribute object to the appropriate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> property or collection.
trans-unit.target: Adicionar o objeto de atributo ao apropriado <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> propriedade ou coleção.

trans-unit.source: For example, you would add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, specifying the member name that is being overridden.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você adicionaria o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute> para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlElements%2A> coleção do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto, especificando o nome do membro que está sendo substituído.

trans-unit.source: Create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method, add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método, adicione o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> o objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the object being overridden is an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, you need only to specify the type of the overridden object.
trans-unit.target: Se o objeto que está sendo substituído for um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, você só precisará especificar o tipo do objeto substituído.

trans-unit.source: But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member.
trans-unit.target: Mas se você está substituindo um campo ou propriedade, você também deve especificar o nome do membro substituído.

trans-unit.source: When constructing the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, pass the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Ao construir o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, passar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Use the resulting <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to serialize or deserialize the derived class objects.
trans-unit.target: Use resultante <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para serializar ou desserializar os objetos de classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir serializa uma classe denominada `Orchestra`, que contém um único campo chamado `Instruments` que retorna uma matriz de `Instrument` objetos.

trans-unit.source: A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class.
trans-unit.target: Uma segunda classe denominada `Brass` herda o `Instrument` classe.

trans-unit.source: The example uses an instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> class to override the `Instrument` field, allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo usa uma instância do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> classe para substituir o `Instrument` campo, permitindo que o campo aceitar `Brass` objetos.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> à coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do objeto que será substituído.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa os atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> à coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies an object to be overridden by the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="type" /> especifica um objeto a ser substituído pelo objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contém uma união de objetos de atributos que fazem com que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para substituir o comportamento de serialização padrão para um conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Escolha os objetos de atributo para colocar no <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto, dependendo dos comportamentos específicos que você deseja substituir.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa um membro de classe como um elemento XML por padrão.

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XM attribute instead, you would create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Se desejar que o membro a ser serializado como um atributo XM, você criaria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, atribuí-lo ao <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>e adicione o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> do objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga para substituir um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The following example serializes a class named `Band` which is derived from a class named `Orchestra`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir serializa uma classe denominada `Band` que é derivada de uma classe denominada `Orchestra`.

trans-unit.source: The example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> object, and assigns it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo cria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> de objeto e atribui-lo para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo, em seguida, chama o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides.Add%2A> método para adicionar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> o objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> of the object to override.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Type" /> do objeto a ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: The name of the member to override.
trans-unit.target: O nome do membro a ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object that represents the overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa os atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Adds an <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> object to the collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um objeto <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> à coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="type" /> parameter specifies an object to be overridden.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="type" /> especifica um objeto a ser substituído.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="member" /> parameter specifies the name of a member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro <paramref name="member" /> especifica o nome de um membro que é substituído.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains a union of attribute objects that cause the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contém uma união de objetos de atributos que fazem com que o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> para substituir o comportamento de serialização padrão para um conjunto de objetos.

trans-unit.source: You choose the attribute objects to place in the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, depending on the particular behaviors you want to override.
trans-unit.target: Escolha os objetos de atributo para colocar no <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto, dependendo dos comportamentos específicos que você deseja substituir.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializes a class member as an XML element by default.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> serializa um membro de classe como um elemento XML por padrão.

trans-unit.source: If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, assign it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>, and add the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Se desejar que o membro a ser serializado como um atributo XML em vez disso, você deve criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, atribuí-lo ao <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>e adicione o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> o objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this method when attempting to override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Use esse método durante a tentativa de substituir um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlIgnoreAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> object, and assigns it to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> de objeto e atribui-lo para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propriedade de um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example then adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, before creating an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo adiciona o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> o objeto para um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto antes de criar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que representa a coleção de atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Type" /> associada à coleção de atributos que você deseja recuperar.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified, base-class, type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto associado ao tipo de classe base especificado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa a coleção de atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object that contains attributes for an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga para retornar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto que contém atributos de uma <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains objects that override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies the overridden member as well as the type.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contém objetos que substituem uma <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>, ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, você deve usar a sobrecarga que especifique o membro substituído, bem como o tipo.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, and an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto, um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto e um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example assigns the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object, and adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo atribui o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlRoot%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> e o adiciona a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> o objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the example gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object by passing the <xref:System.Type> of the serialized class to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o exemplo obtém o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto passando o <xref:System.Type> da classe serializada para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Type> is `Group`.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, o <xref:System.Type> é `Group`.

trans-unit.source: The base class <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that is associated with the collection of attributes you want.
trans-unit.target: A classe base <see cref="T:System.Type" /> associada à coleção de atributos que você deseja.

trans-unit.source: The name of the overridden member that specifies the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> to return.
trans-unit.target: O nome do membro substituído que especifica o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> a ser retornado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the specified (base-class) type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto associado ao tipo especificado (classe base).

trans-unit.source: The member parameter specifies the base-class member that is overridden.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de membro especifica o membro da classe base que é substituído.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> that represents the collection of overriding attributes.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes" /> que representa a coleção de atributos de substituição.

trans-unit.source: Use this overload to return an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object that contains objects that override an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Use essa sobrecarga para retornar um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto que contém objetos que substituir um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlArrayItemAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute>, <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlElementAttribute>, ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlEnumAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object contains an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto contém um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlRootAttribute> ou <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlTypeAttribute>, você deve usar a sobrecarga que especifica apenas o tipo de substituição.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object, an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>, and an <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir cria um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto, um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes>e um <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The example assigns the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object and adds the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo atribui o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeAttribute> para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> e o adiciona a <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> o objeto para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Lastly, the example gets the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> object by passing the <xref:System.Type> of the serialized class and member name to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> object.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, o exemplo obtém o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributes> objeto passando o <xref:System.Type> do nome de classe e membro serializado para o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlAttributeOverrides> objeto.
